title: Preacher
description: Foster child, ex-minister, MC member… Vampire. How the hell had his life gotten so jacked up? His life irrevocably changed when he’s made a creature of the night, Preacher leaves behind his vampire MC brethren , the Sons of Sangue, hoping to shield the woman he desires most from discovering what he’s become. Problem is Tena isn’t about to let him walk out of her life. To protect her heart, Preacher can’t stay. To protect her life, he has no choice but to keep her close.
author: Patricia A. Rasey
